alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Van Buren; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 12:51AM CDT until August 10 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... Cleburne County in north central Arkansas... Northwestern White County in central Arkansas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1251 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fairbanks, or 8 miles south of Fairfield Bay, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Heber Springs... Clinton... Fairfield Bay... Greers Ferry... Quitman... Pangburn... Rose Bud... Shirley... Higden... Fairfield Bay Marina... Crosby... Fairbanks... Sugar Loaf Recreation Area... Choctaw... Letona... Bee Branch... Wilburn... Ida... Brownsville... Sidon... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for central and north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for central and north central Arkansas.
